<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="New Deduction default">897f4d20c34b6d1011971d4ce00131bc</macroponent><name>select_1/messages</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  const index = api.item.index;
	if ( !api.state.deductions[index]["deduction_type"]) {
    return [{
      status: 'critical',
      content: 'Select a deduction Type.'
    }];
  }
  return [];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Milton.Jones@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-16 14:23:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>b3d12de147ae3910265ad698436d43b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>select_1/messages</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Voluntary Deductions" source="x_ebh_voluntary_0">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Voluntary Deductions">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b3d12de147ae3910265ad698436d43b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Milton.Jones@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-16 14:23:52</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
